# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact)
- **New Data:** where a Pers_No in the source does not exist as an EmployeeNumber in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Pers_No in source and EmployeeNumber in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeNumber in the target exists but the same Pers_No doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View hr_record_fact_new is created

%%sql
-- Build hr_record_fact -- merge
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW hr_record_fact_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Pers_No IS NULL
        THEN T2.EmployeeID
        ELSE NULL
    END as HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    T2.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T3.PersonnelAreaID AS PersonnelAreaID,
    T4.PersonnelSubAreaID AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    T5.OrganisationUnitID AS OrganisationalUnitID,
    T6.ContractID AS ContractID,
    T7.PayBandID AS PayBandID,
    T8.CostCenterID AS CostCenterID,
    T9.PositionID AS PositionID,
    T10.ManagerEmployeeID AS ManagerEmployeeID,
    TempMPID.PositionID AS ManagerPositionID,
    T10.CounterSignManagerEmployeeID AS CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    T11.LocationID AS LocationID,
    T12.WorkScheduleID AS WorkScheduleID,
    T14.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as StartDate,
    NULL as EndDate,
    current_timestamp as IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T2.EmployeeID, IFNULL(T3.PersonnelAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T4.PersonnelSubAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T5.OrganisationUnitID, '.'),IFNULL(T6.ContractID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T7.PayBandID, '.'),IFNULL(T8.CostCenterID, '.'),IFNULL(T9.PositionID, '.'),IFNULL(T10.ManagerEmployeeID, '.'),IFNULL(TempMPID.PositionID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T10.CounterSignManagerEmployeeID, '.'), IFNULL(T11.LocationID, '.'),IFNULL(T12.WorkScheduleID, '.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.EmployeeNumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelarea_dim T3 ON T1.PA = T3.PersonnelAreaCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelsubarea_dim T4 ON T1.PSubArea = T4.PersonnelSubAreaCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.organisationunit_dim T5 ON T1.Org_unit = T5.OrganisationUnit
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim T6 ON T1.WorkC = T6.ContractCode AND T1.CT = T6.ContractTypeCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim T7 ON T1.PS_group = T7.PSGroupCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.costcenter_dim T8 ON T1.Cost_Ctr = T8.CostCenterCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T9 ON T1.PositionID= T9.PositionCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim TempMPID ON T1.Manager_Position = T9.PositionCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T10 ON T2.EmployeeID = T10.EmployeeID
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.pins_location_dim T11 ON T1.Loc = T11.LocationCode
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.workshedule_dim T12 ON T1.Work_Schedule_Rule = T12.WorkScheduleRule
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T14 ON "SAP HR" = T14.Description
-- FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact T15 ON ----T1.Pers_No = T7.EmployeeNumber
WHERE  (T7.IsActive = 'Y' or T7.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Pers_No = T7.EmployeeNumber AND md5(concat(T2.EmployeeID, IFNULL(T3.PersonnelAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T4.PersonnelSubAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T5.OrganisationUnitID, '.'),IFNULL(T6.ContractID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T7.PayBandID, '.'),IFNULL(T8.CostCenterID, '.'),IFNULL(T9.PositionID, '.'),IFNULL(T10.ManagerEmployeeID, '.'),IFNULL(TempMPID.PositionID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T10.CounterSignManagerEmployeeID, '.'), IFNULL(T11.LocationID, '.'),IFNULL(T12.WorkScheduleID, '.'))) <> T7.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T2.EmployeeID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Pers_No IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
)
;

SELECT * FROM hr_record_fact_new;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **hr_record_fact_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View hr_record_fact_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW hr_record_fact_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From hr_record_fact_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact
WHERE EmployeeID IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM hr_record_fact_new);

# View hr_record_fact_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table hr_record_fact.employee_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact AS Target
USING hr_record_fact_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.HRRecordID = Target.HRRecordID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.hr_record_fact is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EHRRecordID NULLS LAST) AS EHRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact;
